import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Chart } from 'chart.js'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content', templateUrl: './content.component.html', styleUrls: ['./content.component.css'] }) export class ContentComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() { var myChart = new Chart("myChart", { type: 'bar', data: { labels: ['Red', 'Blue', 'Yellow', 'Green', 'Purple', 'Orange'], datasets: [{ label: '# of Votes', data: [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)' ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)' ], borderWidth: 1 }] }, /* options: { scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true } } } */ }); } }
